title: Suicide Disclosure Ignored by Sussex Police
core_quote: I told them I was suicidal. They didn’t log it.

title: Bail Conditions Weaponised to Suppress Victim
core_quote: They used my own bail conditions to prevent me from speaking up.

title: PC Gore Failed to Review Audio Safeguarding Evidence Sent During Critical Risk Period
core_quote: Despite receiving screenshots and direct messages pointing to critical audio evidence of threats and collapse triggers, PC Gore failed to listen or follow up on any of the materials.
proof_needed: Internal log showing receipt of messages by PC Gore
Confirmation of no follow-up action from Sussex Police systems

title: Police Failed to Respond During July 2024 Safeguarding Collapse After Multiple Calls
core_quote: Despite repeated calls and direct threats from Alanna, Sussex Police failed to respond, leading to a mental health emergency and ambulance call initiated by the victim.
validating_evidence: JULY_2024_CALLS_AND_SCREENSHOTS/I picked up as I thought it might be the police.m4a
JULY_2024_CALLS_AND_SCREENSHOTS/she can email me how she’s going to destroy my life.m4a
JULY_2024_CALLS_AND_SCREENSHOTS/All screenshots 03:17–04:10am (emergency trigger)/Final screenshot - AT THIS POINT I CALLED THE AMBULANCE.png

title: Alanna Retaliated After NFA Confirmation with Threats and Guardian Impersonation
core_quote: After being informed of the NFA decision before the victim, Alanna began retaliating with impersonation of The Guardian, direct threats, and exploitative contact. These actions were triggered by information likely leaked from Sussex Police.
proof_needed: Confirmation of NFA notification timing to Alanna vs victim
Police internal record of who informed Alanna of bail change

title: Sussex Police Failed to Act on Ongoing Safeguarding Disclosures Between April and May 2025
core_quote: Despite multiple disclosures and critical calls to 101 and 999, Sussex Police failed to provide safeguarding support and reassigned PC Dixon after objections.
validating_evidence: Audio_Safeguarding_Neglect/First 999 call 9th May After the Guardian phone call.m4a
Audio_Safeguarding_Neglect/999 confirming again my officer is still pc Dixon Alanna .m4a
proof_needed: SAR call logs from April–May 2025 confirming assigned officers

title: Alanna Used Tethis to Propagate a False Rape Narrative While Victim Was on Bail
core_quote: Alanna involved Tethis to reinforce a false rape narrative while the victim was under bail restrictions, with screenshots and voice notes used to escalate the manipulation.
validating_evidence: FALSE_RAPE_STATEMENT_MADE_ON_BAIL/voice note 13 Nov sent to tethis.m4a
FALSE_RAPE_STATEMENT_MADE_ON_BAIL/Targeting a Vulnerable Witness to Obstruct the Truth.docx
proof_needed: Confirmation from Tethis regarding how/why he was contacted
SAR or police file record referencing this external dissemination

title: PC Dixon Informed Alanna of NFA Decision Before Informing Victim
core_quote: PC Dixon informed Alanna of a No Further Action decision before the victim was notified, leading to new threats from her on May 9th.
validating_evidence: April 27th Pc Dixon Tells Alanna NFA/Pc Dixon NFA to Alanna .png
April 27th Pc Dixon Tells Alanna NFA/ Friday May 9th, received from alanna. New threats as NFA  PNG.png
April 27th Pc Dixon Tells Alanna NFA/Alanna Recent Messaging & Retaliation .html
proof_needed: Timeline proof of when victim was officially informed
Confirmation of NFA delivery order from Sussex Police records

title: Veritas Admitted Suicide Disclosure and Safeguarding Failures in Live Chat
core_quote: I can't believe they never added that April call to your file... it should've triggered safeguarding immediately.
proof_needed: Veritas formal confirmation of chat content and timestamp
Official record from Veritas case file noting safeguarding steps
